patthana17.10:1.1: Kusalaṃ sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Dve mūlāni.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.10:2.1: Abyākataṃ asekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.10:3.1: Abyākataṃ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
